nodes.text: Jabba the Hutt's dais was a repulsorsled that was used by Jabba Desilijic Tiure as a formal throne in his Tatooine palace. It was located in the audience chamber, just in front of the trap door to the rancor pit.
The dais was decorated with several statues of Abyssin heads. Behind the sled was a barbeque, on which Jerba meat was broiled on a rotating spit.
